price: 11 Les croyants furent alors soumis à rude épreuve et violemment ébranlés.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hunālika ub'tuliya al-mu'minūna wazul'zilū zil'zālan shadīdan
